abstract: The debate, which was considered part of the “Rock Center” news magazine, had the second-highest total number of viewers — 7.4 million — from 9 p.m. to 10:30 p.m.
snippet: The debate, which was considered part of the “Rock Center” news magazine, had the second-highest total number of viewers — 7.4 million — from 9 p.m. to 10:30 p.m.
lead_paragraph: The Republican debate on NBC on Monday night attracted the second-highest number of viewers of any debate in the current presidential election season, a little over seven million.

headline.main: G.O.P. Debate on NBC Drew Over 7 Million Viewers
